title: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space
description: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page contains sections of text that are spaced too far apart, causing unnecessary white space and making the page appear disorganized.
OB: The sections of text on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page are spaced too far apart.
EB: The sections of text on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page should be closer together to reduce unnecessary white space.
SR: Adjust the spacing between sections of text on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page to have a more organized layout and reduce unnecessary white space.
